name: Obsidian Archive File
summary: An OAF file is an archive used by a video game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It contains game assets, such as in-game images, audio, and text. Players are not meant to open OAF files, but modders have created tools that allow them to extract the assets that OAF files contain.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: South Park: The Stick of Truth OAF Files Extractor
Dungeon Siege III OAF Files Extractor
